articles.title: First Blood Moon of 2022: What is it and why ancient civilisations feared it - WION
articles.description: Earth will soon witness a Blood Moon. From parts of Antarctica, the Americas, as well as western Europe, Africa and parts of the eastern Pacific, the eclipse will be visible late May 15th and early May 16th.

articles.title: New EU report links Kinahan cartel linked to 20 murders in four countries across Europe - Sunday World
articles.description: The “notorious” Kinahan cartel has been involved “in at least 20 murders" and is one of the top cocaine trafficking gangs driving worsening violence in Europe, according to a new report.

articles.title: EU tweaks Russia oil sanctions plan in bid to win over reluctant states - Reuters
articles.description: The European Commission has proposed changes to its planned embargo on Russian oil to give Hungary, Slovakia and the Czech Republic more time to prepare for the shift in their energy supplies, three EU sources said on Friday.
